remarks.format: ## Remarks 資訊清單平台可以有下列值之一： `x86`， `x64`， `Itanium`，或`AnyCPU`。The manifest platform can have one of the following values: `x86`, `x64`, `Itanium`, or `AnyCPU`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是空的這表示沒有任何篩選的目標 framework 為基礎的參考。The default value is empty, which means there is no filtering for the references based on the target framework.
